title: Youth rewards that grow local & responsible business
text: Young people get real offers, discounts and freebies at locally owned, sustainable, socially responsible businesses. Those businesses get more young foot traffic—from people who actually care about community.

title: I’m a young person
text: Find nearby offers, scan at checkout to redeem, and get invited back when new offers drop. Real relief and belonging—not points.

title: I’m a business
text: List a values-aligned offer, appear on the map and youth channels, welcome new regulars, and see visits with simple impact reporting.

title: Local & values‑driven
text: Partners are locally owned and prioritise sustainability, fair work and community impact.

title: Rewards that matter
text: Youth unlock discounts, freebies and specials—not points. Real relief and belonging.

title: Foot traffic, not hype
text: Businesses meet new regulars who align with their values. We drive visits, not vanity metrics.

title: For Youth — Find offers nearby, scan, save, and share
text: Browse the map for participating partners. Claim a discount, freebie or special. Scan at checkout to redeem and log your visit. Get invited back when new offers drop.

title: For Businesses — List an offer, welcome more young customers
text: Create a simple, values‑aligned offer. We list you on the map and youth channels. Young people scan in store—you meet new regulars. See visits and simple impact reporting.

title: Sample offer — Green Bean Roasters
text: Locally owned • Compostable cups. Free small with any toastie (Mon–Wed).

title: Sample offer — Loop Thrift
text: Circular fashion • Community grants. 15% off all recycled denim.

title: Sample offer — Suncoast Repair Hub
text: Right‑to‑repair • Youth workshops. Free phone diagnostics + 10% off parts.

title: Values fit (vetting)
text: We vet for local ownership and social responsibility so the network stays trusted.

title: Simple scans
text: One scan to redeem. No crypto, no paywalls, no hoops.

title: Proof of action (visits)
text: Visits are recorded as participation so businesses see authentic youth engagement.

title: How it works — overview
text: ECO Local connects young people and local businesses around shared care. Every scan adds to your ECO—a marker of the good you’ve helped move forward.

title: Step 1 — Find local partners
text: Cafés, thrift stores, markets, workshops—all part of a new kind of network.

title: Step 2 — Claim real offers
text: Every partner gives youth discounts or free offers—no sign‑up fees, ever.

title: Step 3 — Scan to grow ECO
text: After checkout, scan the ECO Local code. ECO isn’t money—it’s proof you’re shaping the future.

title: Step 4 — See your impact grow
text: Track your ECO, badges, and milestones as the district comes to life.

title: ECO — the energy of shared progress
text: ECO doesn’t decide who can survive—it shows who’s building something that lasts. It’s a signal of contribution, not currency. A way to measure hope, not worth.

title: The district is waking up
text: Every ECO shared adds to the network. Every youth connected strengthens the loop. Together, we’re creating the first generation that owns its economy—without being owned by it.

title: Join the movement that gives more than it takes
text: Free for youth. Built for balance. Be part of something that feels like the future should.

title: Lead the change, keep it local
text: ECO Local connects purpose‑driven youth with businesses that care. Contribute to a stable, human economy built on trust, not volatility.

title: Simple, transparent, meaningful (business)
text: Each youth scan rewards them with ECO—your store’s proof of care—while your contribution adds to a lasting impact score.

title: Business step 1 — Join with a monthly pledge
text: Pay what you want. Your contribution adds ECO into the district every month.

title: Business step 2 — Dynamic ECO per scan
text: Each interaction rewards youth with ECO based on your engagement and sustainability tier.

title: Business step 3 — Your impact score
text: A reflection of your contribution, loyalty, and community reach—not capped by money.

title: Business step 4 — Visibility that matters
text: Featured on the map, in community events, and through the youth network.

title: Stability through contribution
text: ECO isn’t a currency to rely on—it’s proof of shared growth. Your store adds energy to the loop every time you take part.

title: Together, we build a living economy
text: ECO Local partners are proving that sustainability and survival don’t have to compete. The more we give, the stronger the system becomes—stable, local, and human.

title: Join as a Partner
text: Be part of a network that redefines value—measured not in dollars, but in difference.
